fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Scream at night, upgrading the attack value of all attacks for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only scream once.
- You may not scream night one.
- The Town will be notified you have screamed.
- Every kill during a scream grants you an extra charge.
- If the foxes win, you will win regardless of if you are living or have fulfilled your win condition.
- You have access to the fox night chat if the foxes spawn.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
See three players die during a scream.

"You have decided to scream tonight."
"You changed your mind."
"You sense someone's death while you screamed last night".

[ A Fox screamed throughout the town! ]
